data.why:
I'm building a command line interface to the Mediawiki software
    which runs http://www.wikipedia.org and http://www.wikitravel.org
    among others. The basic idea is to have something like CVS, so that
    a wiki contributor can edit any number of .wiki files locally in the
    editor of their choice, update with new changes from the wiki
    server, and commit changes.

    I've written it in Perl to take advantage of the LWP library. It
    consists of a module and a calling script.
